snippet.title: Nausicaä Kiki Ippatsu (ナウシカ危機一髪) for the NEC PC-6001 mkII
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

Nausicaä Kiki Ippatsu is a side-scrolling shoot'em up based on the anime sci-fi adventure movie "Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind", directed by Hayao Miyazaki and distributed by Toei Company (this was before Studio Ghibli was founded, yet still considered to be a Ghibli movie).

The game's title translates to "Nausicaä's Close Call" and the player is Nausicaä in her glider, shooting down enemies including bosses (from level 2 onwards).
